languages.text: "Не тебе, Соломон, судить человека, который пытается вырваться из когтей бесчестья. На мне тоже однажды пытались поставить крест. Матроса больше не трогать — и точка".
"It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."
languages.original_text: "Не тебе, Соломон, судить человека, который пытается вырваться из когтей бесчестья. На мне тоже однажды пытались поставить крест. Матроса больше не трогать — и точка".

traits.locale_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."
"It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."
"It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."
"It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."
"It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

languages.text: 「不名誉の爪から逃れようとする男を裁くのは、君の役目ではない、ソロモーン。{mf|俺|私}もかつて見捨てられそうになったことがある。あのヴォイズマンは放っておけ。二度は言わない」
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: 「不名誉の爪から逃れようとする男を裁くのは、君の役目ではない、ソロモーン。{mf|俺|私}もかつて見捨てられそうになったことがある。あのヴォイズマンは放っておけ。二度は言わない」

languages.text: "Es steht Euch nicht zu, Solomorne, einen Mann zu richten, der versucht, den Klauen der Ehrlosigkeit zu entkommen. Mich wollten sie auch schon einmal abschreiben. Lasst den Raumfahrer gehen – ich werde es kein zweites Mal sagen."
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: "Es steht Euch nicht zu, Solomorne, einen Mann zu richten, der versucht, den Klauen der Ehrlosigkeit zu entkommen. Mich wollten sie auch schon einmal abschreiben. Lasst den Raumfahrer gehen – ich werde es kein zweites Mal sagen."

languages.text: "Onursuzluğun pençesinden sıyrılmaya çabalayan bir adamı yargılamak sana düşmez Solomorne. Vaktiyle beni de tasfiye etmeye kalkmışlardı. O uçsuz erine dokunma, lafımı tekrarlamayacağım."
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: "Onursuzluğun pençesinden sıyrılmaya çabalayan bir adamı yargılamak sana düşmez Solomorne. Vaktiyle beni de tasfiye etmeye kalkmışlardı. O uçsuz erine dokunma, lafımı tekrarlamayacağım."

languages.text: «Solomorne, no le corresponde juzgar a alguien que intenta escapar de las garras del deshonor. A mí también intentaron desecharme. Deje estar a este infante del vacío. No lo repetiré».
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, no le corresponde juzgar a alguien que intenta escapar de las garras del deshonor. A mí también intentaron desecharme. Deje estar a este infante del vacío. No lo repetiré».

languages.text: “索罗蒙，这个人在努力摆脱过去的耻辱，你无权对这样的人进行审判。以前也有人打算把我的努力一笔勾销。放了这个船员，这句话我不想再说第二遍。”
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，这个人在努力摆脱过去的耻辱，你无权对这样的人进行审判。以前也有人打算把我的努力一笔勾销。放了这个船员，这句话我不想再说第二遍。”

languages.text: « Solomorne, vous n'êtes pas en position de juger un homme qui tente de retrouver son honneur. Je ne connais que trop bien ce genre de situations. Laissez cet homme en paix. Je ne me répéterai pas. »
languages.original_text: "It is not for you, Solomorne, to judge a man trying to escape the claws of dishonour. They tried to write me off once too. Let the voidsman be — I won't say it again."

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, vous n'êtes pas en position de juger un homme qui tente de retrouver son honneur. Je ne connais que trop bien ce genre de situations. Laissez cet homme en paix. Je ne me répéterai pas. »
